cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SI

Reasoning: The paper discusses the concept of escalation in games, which is a topic that falls under game theory (cs.GT). The paper also mentions the use of coinduction, which is a technique used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses economic games, which can be analyzed using data structures (cs.DS) and social influence (cs.SI).
